name: InverteBreaker
description:
Brick breaker on an alien planet starring little serpenty critters. 

This is my first GameMaker Game ever uploaded/shared! Woohoo! Also first jam by myself!

Done for ADG Slam Jam 2 to theme "Out of this World" and implementing  the modifier "Calm up".  Can you survive 5 (badly coded, I mean, spectacular) stages?

All art, programming, design, sound, done by me on top of having to study. I ain't sayin' it isn't broken.  I tried my best for now.....hoping to refine in future!  I know snakes aren't invertebrates but these are otherworldly critters.
